AboutSection.title: About eTechlo
AboutSection.slogan: Developing Success at the Speed of Techlo
AboutSection.desc1: eTechlo is a software development company specializing in building advanced technology solutions for businesses. We believe technology should be accessible, efficient, and tailored to every business.
AboutSection.desc2: With years of experience in the high-tech industry, our team combines advanced technical knowledge with a deep understanding of business needs to create solutions that deliver real results.
features: Professional team with years of experience

cards.title: Website Development
cards.desc: Building modern, fast, and custom websites for your business.

cards.title: Internal Systems
cards.desc: Development of management systems, CRM, ERP, and internal automations.

cards.title: Tech Consulting
cards.desc: Guidance, consulting, and technological direction for businesses at any stage.

cards.title: Automation / DevOps
cards.desc: Implementing DevOps processes, automation, and business process improvement.

ProcessSection.title: Our Process
ProcessSection.subtitle: How we turn ideas into digital success:

steps.title: Discovery & Strategy
steps.desc: Understanding needs, defining goals, and creating a tailored action plan for each client.

steps.title: Design & UX
steps.desc: Modern, user-friendly interface design, wireframes, and UX for success.

steps.title: Agile Development
steps.desc: Professional development with the latest technologies, ensuring high-quality, flexible code.

steps.title: Testing & Quality
steps.desc: Thorough testing throughout to ensure a stable, fast, and bug-free product.

steps.title: Launch & Support
steps.desc: Go-live, ongoing support, and guidance for your success.

TestimonialsSection.title: What Our Clients Say
TestimonialsSection.subtitle: We're proud of our long-term partnerships with satisfied clients. Here's what they have to say about working with us.

testimonials.text: eTechlo turned our vision into reality. Their professional team built us an advanced management system that saves us hours of work every week. The communication was excellent and the results exceeded expectations.
testimonials.name: David Cohen

testimonials.text: We worked with eTechlo on a complex business automation project. They understood exactly what we needed and guided us through a professional and organized process. The result is amazing - 40% time savings in processing.
testimonials.name: Sarah Levy

testimonials.text: The new website eTechlo built for us led to a 60% increase in conversions. The design is modern, fast, and mobile-friendly. The team was available for any question and support throughout the process.
testimonials.name: Michael Rosenberg

testimonials.text: eTechlo provided us with excellent technological consulting that helped us choose the right solution for our business. They don't just sell services - they're true partners in our success.
testimonials.name: Noa Abraham

testimonials.text: The internal system eTechlo developed for us changed the way we work. The process was smooth, professional, and the result is excellent. Highly recommend to any business looking for technological solutions.
testimonials.name: Yossi Shapira

Footer.slogan: Advanced software solutions for businesses. From vision to digital reality.
